author: ajsutton
content: We're working through converting our validator client over to the standard REST APIs and I've hit an issue with the `/eth/v1/validator/beacon_commitee_subscriptions` endpoint which doesn't seem to support persistent subscriptions.  I've logged an issue which hopefully explains it: https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-APIs/issues/98 Discussion is probably best on the issue, but flagging here so it gets noticed.
